abstract: Borders Group, which counts hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management as its largest investor, announced on Tuesday that Ron Marshall had resigned as chief executive just a year after he took the helm of the second-largest U.S. bookstore chain.
snippet: Borders Group, which counts hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management as its largest investor, announced on Tuesday that Ron Marshall had resigned as chief executive just a year after he took the helm of the second-largest U.S. bookstore chain...
lead_paragraph: The Borders Group, which counts hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management as its largest investor, announced on Tuesday that Ron Marshall had resigned as chief executive just a year after he took the helm of the country’s second-largest bookstore chain, adding to anxiety among publishers about the health of the book market.

abstract: Photos and updates to accounts on social media sites like Facebook can also be viewed on Wi-Fi-enabled digital photo frames.
snippet: Photos and updates to accounts on social media sites like Facebook can also be viewed on Wi-Fi-enabled digital photo frames.
lead_paragraph: Media Street has created a service called LifeGoRound that serves as a content portal for its eMotion Social Connect digital frame, an 8-inch Wi-Fi-enabled display priced at $149. The LifeGoRound Web site enables you to view photos stored at sharing sites like Flickr, Picasa, Photobucket and Wal-Mart.

headline.main: Picture This: One Frame to View All Your Photos
headline.print_headline: Picture This: One Frame to View All Your Photos
